text: Jacques Castérède (10 April 1926 - 6 April 2014)« Jacques Castérède est mort » sur Qobuz.com, 8 avril 2014 was a French composer and pianist. He won the Grand Prix de Rome in 1953 with his cantata La boîte de Pandore (Pandora's Box). He was born in Paris. Castérède died on 6 April 2014 in Dijon from natural causes, aged 87. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:20th-century French composers Category:French pianists Category:Musicians from Paris
title: Jacques Castérède
